title: Another Day Out
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Mmm~, that was delicious~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I’m glad that we came for the melon fair event.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah! I really wanted to try the teddy bear melon ice cream crepe.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ah, Ayumu-san, you have some whipped cream around your mouth...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Eh? Where, where? Could you wipe it for me~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Okay, I wiped it. Fufu, you’re rarely like this, Ayumu-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ehehe, keep this a secret, okay? Oh, right. Shioriko-chan, here you go.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eh? This is......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>You’ve been collecting the reward stamps for this place, right? I heard you almost have enough.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>You’re going to give yours to me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yes, take them. What were you thinking of redeeming them towards?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Um, I was thinking of getting the keychain with the limited edition design.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I see. Show me once you’ve got it then!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Of course! You’ll be the first to know!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
